https://tmrev.io/movie/226105-Chic: Live at the Budokan 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/QYSR3g10OoHZK86JP0geZ3t2Rp.jpg Chic's concert at the Tokyo Budokan on April 17, 1996. This concert was a celebration of the Chic legacy, and featured an all-star line-up with guest appearances by Sister Sledge, Slash and Steve Winwood. It was released three years after its recording in unedited form, including spoken introductions by both Edwards and Rodgers. Chic: Live at the Budokan
